person.persName: Warren Viley (Scott County farmer and horse breeder. Brother-in-law of George Washington Johnson)

body.p: Born in and lived in Scott County, Kentucky. Son of Willa Viley and Lydia Smith. Brother of Ann Eliza Viley, who married Provisional Governor George Washington Johnson. Married Jane Martin. Owned a large farm in Scott County, Kentucky, where he raised crops and bred thoroughbred horses, including race horses.
